metadata.title: CVE-2020-0430 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In skb_headlen of /include/linux/skbuff.h, there is a possible out ofbounds read due to memory corruption. This could lead to local escalationof privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-153881554

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
